ASK_OBJECT:
{
  "QUESTIONS": [
    {
      "Q": "What specific organic forms or natural motifs (e.g., flowing vines, blooming flowers, wave patterns) are commonly depicted in this style, and how are they rendered in terms of form and motion?",
      "DIMENSION": "FORM",
      "WHY": "Identifies core natural elements that embody the style's organic vitality and emotional resonance.",
      "PRIORITY": 1,
      "ANSWER_FORMAT": "List of organic forms or natural motifs (e.g., vines, blossoms, waves) and their rendering characteristics (e.g., flowing, expanding, pulsing)",
      "DEPENDENCIES": ["organic natural forms", "fluid, flowing lines", "emotional vitality"]
    },
    {
      "Q": "What range of color temperature contrasts (e.g., 60% warm reds vs. 30% cool blues) and how are they distributed across the composition to evoke emotional atmosphere?",
      "DIMENSION": "COLOR_PALETTE",
      "WHY": "Clarifies how warm-cool contrasts contribute to emotional mood, directly linking color to feeling in the style.",
      "PRIORITY": 2,
      "ANSWER_FORMAT": "Warm-to-cool temperature ratio (e.g., 60% warm, 40% cool) and distribution (e.g., reds on left, blues on right)",
      "DEPENDENCIES": ["bold contrasts between warm and cool tones", "emotional charge", "hue dominance: 50–60% red, 20–30% blue"]
    },
    {
      "Q": "What types of textures or surface qualities (e.g., velvety, rough, shimmering) are implied or suggested by the brushwork, and how do they relate to the emotional tone of the scene?",
      "DIMENSION": "TEXTURE",
      "WHY": "Connects physical surface quality to emotional atmosphere, enhancing the expressive depth of the style.",
      "PRIORITY": 3,
      "ANSWER_FORMAT": "List of implied textures (e.g., velvety, shimmering, rough) and their emotional associations (e.g., warmth, movement, joy)",
      "DEPENDENCIES": ["expressive brushstrokes", "fluid, sweeping motions", "minimal detail"]
    }
  ],
  "COUNT": 3,
  "NEGATIVE_CHECKS": [
    "Are any objects or forms rendered with realistic proportions or anatomical accuracy?",
    "Are there any static, rigid, or geometric shapes that break the organic flow?",
    "Is the color palette muted, flat, or desaturated in any section of the composition?"
  ],
  "FOLLOWUP_TRIGGERS": [
    "IF FORM includes flowing vines or blossoms THEN ask for specific motion or growth direction (e.g., curling upward, spreading outward)",
    "IF COLOR_PALETTE mentions warm-cool contrast THEN ask for spatial distribution of hues (e.g., reds on right, blues on left)",
    "IF TEXTURE references shimmering or rough THEN ask for how it contributes to emotional tone (e.g., joy, tension)"
  ]
}
